movies.title: Prince in Hell
movies.plot: The story is set soon after the reunification of West and East Germany, and is about the disintegrating relationship between Jockel a political activist and Stefan a heroin junkie, and their involvement with a bisexual Micha. A 2nd plot line is concerned with Micha's young son Sascha, and his life in a rundown world of drugs and poverty. His fascination with the creepy, exhibitionist puppeteer Firlefanz, whose grotesque puppets enact a gay fairy tale paralleling the relationship of Stefan and Jockel. Central to the disintegration of these characters is the drug dealer Ingolf, who 'pulls their strings' with heroin, instead of puppet wires.

biography.bio: Wolfram Haack is an actor and writer, known for Prince in Hell (1993), Gibbi - Westgermany (1980) and The Blue Hour (1992).
biography.name: Wolfram Haack

biography.bio: Stefan Laarmann is an actor and writer, known for Prince in Hell (1993).
biography.name: Stefan Laarmann

biography.bio: Michael Stock was born on March 24, 1968 in Steinhöring, Germany. He is a director and actor, known for Postcard to Daddy (2010), Prince in Hell (1993) and Healing By Sharing: A Trip Through Kenya (2013).
biography.name: Michael Stock

biography.bio: Andreas Stadler is an actor and writer, known for Prince in Hell (1993), The Elevator (2014) and Le cercle (2014).
biography.name: Andreas Stadler

biography.bio: Nils-Leevke Schmidt is an actor, known for Prince in Hell (1993).
biography.name: Nils-Leevke Schmidt

biography.bio: Simone Spengler is an actress, known for Prince in Hell (1993) and Nah am Wasser (1994).
biography.name: Simone Spengler

biography.bio: Harry Baer was born on September 27, 1947 in Biberach an der Riß, Germany as Harald Zöttl. He is an actor and assistant director, known for The Third Generation (1979), Ludwig - Requiem for a Virgin King (1972) and Pourquoi monsieur R. est-il atteint de folie meurtrière? (1970).
biography.name: Harry Baer

biography.bio: Alexander Schröder is an actor, known for Der Erdnußmann (1992), Traumstreuner (1994) and Prince in Hell (1993).
biography.name: Alexander Schröder

biography.bio: Olivier Picot is known for his work on Wings of Desire (1987), Vaterland (1992) and Nihil oder Alle Zeit der Welt (1987).
biography.name: Olivier Picot

biography.bio: Henry Fenrich is an actor, known for Prince in Hell (1993).
biography.name: Henry Fenrich

biography.bio: Dirk Ludigs is an actor, known for Prince in Hell (1993) and My Wonderful West Berlin (2017).
biography.name: Dirk Ludigs

biography.bio: Stefan Bielefeld is an actor, known for Prince in Hell (1993).
biography.name: Stefan Bielefeld

biography.bio: Marius Zekri is an actor, known for Prince in Hell (1993).
biography.name: Marius Zekri

biography.bio: Else Elsterhof is an actress, known for Prince in Hell (1993).
biography.name: Else Elsterhof

biography.bio: Susanne Held is an actress, known for Prince in Hell (1993) and Der Ärgermacher (2003).
biography.name: Susanne Held
